title: Major shakeup underway at HHS as White House braces for midterms
description: Several senior officials are exiting RFK Jr.'s department amid an effort to focus on drug pricing and food issues.
content: Several senior officials are exiting RFK Jr.'s department amid an effort to focus on drug pricing and food issues.
